articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides Maneuvers of Newly Built Warship
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides Maneuvers of Newly Built Warship 
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, guided maneuvers of a newly built warship. 
					 Looking around the warship, he learned in detail about its displacement, speed, combat equipment performance, etc. 
					
					 He highly praised the KPA and relevant field for successfully building the vessel by their own efforts on the basis of latest military science and technology. 
					
					 He said that the vessel is one of the warships in the 21st century as it is able to automatically control all the combat activities including navigation and firing and simultaneously strike different targets. 
					
					 Then he guided maneuvers of the warship. 
					
					 He was greatly satisfied to see the high maneuverability and striking capability of the warship. 
					
					 Underscoring the need to make many multi-functional, well-equipped warships and steadily improve the combat capability of the navy, he set forth important tasks to further strengthen the navy as required by the modern war in the 21st century. 
					
					 He was accompanied by Yun Tong Hyon, Pak Jong Chon, Kim Myong Sik, Ri Pyong Chol, Hwang Pyong So, Hong Yong Chil and Kim Pyong Ho.

articles.title: National Meeting Marks 53rd Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Songun Revolutionary Leadership
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks 53rd Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Songun Revolutionary Leadership
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place at the April 25 House of Culture Saturday to celebrate the 53rd anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 The meeting was attended by Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae and other senior officials of the party, state and army, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, public organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials in the fields of science, education, literature and art, public health and media, labor innovators and other people in the city.
					
					 KPA Vice Marshal Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea and director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, made a report.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's Songun revolutionary leadership and Songun politics reflected the iron faith, matchless grit and pluck and ardent patriotism of the peerlessly Songun brilliant commander and peerless patriot and they serve as an all-powerful treasured sword for triumphantly ushering in a new era of the Juche revolution, he said.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's Songun revolutionary leadership brought about an epochal turn in the destiny of the country and the people, and its attraction and vitality were fully demonstrated in the revolution and construction, he pointed out.
					
					 The Songun revolutionary cause of Juche is now greeting a new historic turning point as it is led by Marshal Kim Jong Un, the reporter said, underlining the need to remain single-mindedly loyal to his Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 The reporter called for training all service personnel to be ones strong in idea and faith remaining intensely loyal to the party and the leader and stalwart fighters equipped with Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's strategy and tactics and full capacity to fight a real war. He also called for helping the KPA take on perfect appearance as a regular revolutionary army.
					
					 All the service personnel and people should intensify the drive for displaying the "speed on Masik Pass" and making uninterrupted great leap forward and innovations on all fronts for socialist construction, the reporter said, and went on:
					
					 Peace is dearer to us than anything else as our general goal is to build an economic power and improve the standard of people's living.
					
					 The Korean people do not want a war but hope for averting a fratricidal war and reunifying the country independently and peacefully at any cost.
					
					 We will make every possible effort to prevent a new war on the Korean Peninsula and achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country by concerted efforts of the nation, holding high the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, the great programmes for reunification common to the nation in the new century and the landmarks for peace and prosperity.
					
					 We will boost the friendly and cooperative relations with different countries which respect the DPRK's sovereignty and are friendly toward it in the idea of independence, peace and friendship and positively contribute to defending peace and stability in Northeast Asia and the rest of the world and achieving global independence.

articles.title: Base Act of Blocking Import of Ski Resort Equipment Cannot Be Justified: Statement
articles.content:
Base Act of Blocking Import of Equipment for Ski Resort Cannot Be Justified: DPRK Skiers Association
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Skiers Association issued the following statement Saturday:
					 The construction of the world's leading Ski Resort on Masik Pass is progressing apace at a final stage in the DPRK. It began last year according to the determination and plan of the Workers' Party of Korea to provide the people, youth and children with highly civilized and happy living conditions and make them enjoy all blessings.
					
					 The construction of ski courses was completed and all objects including the construction of hotel, service building and lodging quarters are nearing completion and a sure guarantee has been provided for finishing the construction of the ski resort within this year.
					
					 But there occurred a very abnormal case that some countries recently blocked the import of cableway equipment for the ski resort, pursuant to UN "sanctions".
					
					 By origin, the DPRK did not recognize the UN "resolutions on sanctions" against it but "resolutions" say objects needed for economic construction and people's living should not be subject to sanctions.
					
					 Cableway equipment for the ski resort do not produce any rocket or nuclear weapon.
					
					  If the governments of some countries consider that ordinary inhabitants of the DPRK should not be allowed to use the ski resort, it is an unpardonable insult to its social system and people.
					
					 The U.S. and its followers are very displeased to see grand monumental edifices springing up in the DPRK every day and its prestige rising higher than ever before. They are working hard to put the brake on this development at any cost.
					
					 Some countries, pressurized by the U.S. high-handed practices, are blocking the DPRK from importing even equipment to be installed in mass sports facilities such as the ski resort. This is a wanton violation of the UN Charter clarifying that sanctions should not impose sufferings and damage on the peaceful existence and activities of mankind and the people in relevant countries.
					
					 Such base act can never be justified.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Ukrainian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Ukrainian President
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Saturday sent a congratulatory message to Viktor Yanukovich, president of Ukraine, on its national day.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would favorably develop in the future, too, wishing the Ukrainian president success in his responsible work for the socio-political stability of the country and modernization of its economy.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Makes Field Survey of Various Units
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Makes Field Survey of Various Units
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju made a field survey of the production made at the Namhung Youth Chemical Complex and the Chongchongang Thermal Power Plant.
					 Going round different places of the complex, the premier encouraged officials and workers who are bringing about a boost in the fertilizer production before holding a consultative meeting.
					
					 The meeting called on the complex to produce more chemical goods including Juche fertilizer and functional three-ply sheets for greenhouse and successfully ensure raw and other materials needed for the production in the relevant units.
					
					 The meeting was held at the Chongchongang Thermal Power Plant. It called on the officials and workers to improve the management of equipment and technological control and increase the production of electricity.
					
					 Meanwhile, the premier looked round the national 206 variety sundries exhibition and the experiment farm under the Academy of Agricultural Science and underscored the need to increase the varieties of consumer goods, increase the production and step up the industrialization of agriculture.

articles.title: DPRK Government Delegation Visits Cameroon
articles.content:
DPRK Government Delegation Visits Cameroon
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The DPRK government delegation led by Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun visited the Republic of Cameroon.
					 Prime Minister of Cameroon Yang Yunji Philemon met the delegation at the government building on Aug. 22 and had a friendly talk with it.
					
					 The prime minister said Cameroon sets store by the long-standing friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries.
					
					 He wished the Korean people greater success in their efforts for building a thriving nation under the wise leadership of HE Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 He expressed his will to make a contribution to boosting the cooperative relations between the two countries on the principle of mutual respect and benefits. 
					
					 Prior to the meeting, there were talks between Pak Ui Chun and Pierre Moukoko Mbonjo, minister of External Relations of Cameroon.
					
					 Present there from the DPRK side were members of the government delegation and the DPRK ambassador to Cameroon and from the Cameroonian side senior officials of the Ministry of External Relations.
					
					 At the talks both sides exchanged their views on the issue of boosting the friendly relations between the two countries and matters of mutual concern.

articles.title: Tourism-related Explanation Session Held in DPRK
articles.content:
Tourism-related Explanation Session Held in DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- A tourism-related explanation session, sponsored by the International Travel Company of the DPRK, took place at the Yanggakdo International Hotel here Saturday.
					 Present at the session on invitation were staff members of foreign embassies in DPRK and representatives of travel companies from China, Britain, Germany and other countries.
					
					 Addressing the session, Jo Song Gyu, head of the International Travel Company of the DPRK, referred to the development of tourism in the DPRK and its policy on tourism.
					
					 Mts. Paektu, Kumgang and Chilbo, Wonsan City and other scenic spots and areas in the country have turned into recreation grounds and tourist resorts and a brisk drive is being conducted to further develop them, he noted.
					
					 The tourist resorts will be run in the form of special zone for tourism and all the management activities such as passage through boundaries, customs, taxes, communications and investment protection will go by the DPRK's relevant law on special zones as well as the international rules, Jo said.
					
					 He further said that businesspersons and investors of any countries and regions interested in tourism of DPRK would be welcomed and preference be given to private and joint-venture and collaboration businesses.
					
					 He also mentioned a plan to invite foreign experts needed for the development and management of the tourist resorts in various parts of the country including Wonsan City and Mt. Chilbo.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats for Army Building to Remain Forever
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats for Army Building to Remain Forever
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- August 25 is the Day of Songun (military-first) in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 General Secretary Kim Jong Il inspected the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the Korean People's Army (KPA) on August 25, Juche 49 (1960) as the start of his Songun guidance.
					
					 He gave an important instruction that the KPA should train all its soldiers to be persons of ideology and faith, fully prepared in politico-ideological and military technical aspects, under the slogan of "Let us defend with our very lives the Party Central Committee headed by the respected Comrade Kim Il Sung!"
					
					 Since then he had made energetic efforts to building up the revolutionary armed forces into an invincible army. 
					
					 He advanced the unique army-building program for training all servicepersons to be Juche-type revolutionaries loyal to the party and the leader and conducting army-building and military activities strictly on the basis of the Juche idea in January 1975 and energetically guided the work to carry it into practice.
					
					 In those days he ceaselessly inspected military posts in the frontline area and on islets and sometimes guided military trainings aboard warships, planes and tanks, always finding himself among KPA officers and men.
					
					 When President Kim Il Sung passed away suddenly, Kim Jong Il visited the Dwarf Pine Post of the KPA, declaring his strong will to accomplish with arms the revolutionary cause of Juche pioneered by the President.
					
					 He set forth the idea of giving precedence to the army over the working class for the first time in the history of the world revolutionary movement and worked heart and soul to strengthen the KPA, main force of the Korean revolution, into the invincible Paektusan army.
					
					 He inspected the Cho Islet Defence Detachment and a naval unit by a small speedboat and then visited the KPA Panmunjom Mission at dawn to implant faith in sure victory and transparent class consciousness into servicepersons. He also personally pushed his car on the road of steep cliff in Mt. Osong to visit military units.
					
					 Thanks to his distinguished and energetic guidance, the KPA turned into an army strong in ideology and faith, which is imbued with the Juche idea, the Songun idea and strictly based on the Party's system of command, and into an invincible army fully equipped with the Korean-style strategy and tactics and advanced offensive and defensive means.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's exploits for army-building will remain long with the history of the country.

articles.title: Dancing Party Marks Day of Songun
articles.content:
Dancing Party Marks Day of Songun
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- A dancing party of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces took place Saturday to celebrate the 53rd Day of Songun.
					 The dancing party began with song "Our Comrade Kim Jong Il". "Twelve Months for Victory of Songun", "Soldiers Offer Glory" and other songs resounded forth in the venue of the dancing party.
					
					 The participants recollected the Songun leadership feats of General Secretary Kim Jong Il, who provided the invincible military capacity and the great army-people unity with his outstanding idea and leadership for over half a century since he began his Songun revolutionary leadership and led to victory the struggle for defending socialism and building a thriving nation.
					
					 The song "Our Leader Loved by People" resounded in the air, heating up the atmosphere of the dancing party.
					
					 The dancers presented dynamic movements to the tune of such songs as "Ardent Desire", "We Will Win Victory, Flying the Colors of the Supreme Commander" and "We Will Defend General Kim Jong Un at the Cost of Our Lives" out of the desire to discharge their mission and duty as the army of the leader and the party, fluttering the flags bearing the beaming images of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: DPRK Women Boxers Prove Successful at Int'l Games
articles.content:
DPRK Women Boxers Prove Successful at Int'l Tournament
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- DPRK women boxers proved successful at the 3rd Taiwan international boxing tournament.
					 The tournament took place in Taipei of China from Aug. 15 to 18. It brought together boxers of 16 countries and regions including the DPRK, Thailand, Mongolia, Kazakhstan and Hong Kong of China.
					
					 Ri Hyang Mi and Ri Kwang Suk bested their rivals to place first in 51 kg and 60 kg categories respectively.
					
					 U Yong Gum and Kim Hyang Mi finished second in 48 kg and 51 kg categories.

articles.title: Men's Premier Soccer League Matches Ends
articles.content:
Men's Premier Soccer League Ends
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Men's premier soccer league matches for celebrating the Youth Day ended.
					 There were matches between the Sonbong Team and the Team of the Ministry of Light Industry, between the Kigwancha Team and the Rimyongsu Team and between the Amnokgang Team and the Wolmido Team all belonging to Group B. They took place at Kim Il Sung Stadium Saturday.
					
					 The Sonbong Team beat its rival 2:1, the Rimyongsu Team trounced its rival 4:1 and the Amnokgang Team bested its rival 4:0.
					
					 The Sonbong Team came first among teams belonging to Group B while the Amnokgang became a runner-up. They advanced into semi-finals.
					
					 The matches go on.

articles.title: Toksong Junior Secondary School Named after Hero
articles.content:
Toksong Junior Secondary School Named after Hero
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Toksong Junior Secondary School in Wonsan City, Kangwon Province of the DPRK was named after Han Pyong Nam, DPRK hero.
					 After graduating the school, Han served at a people's security organ for years. He discovered and defused a lot of explosives, protecting the security and properties of people.
					
					 While defusing a time bomb dropped by the U.S. imperialists during the Fatherland Liberation War in October last year, he saved his comrades at the critical moment and died a heroic death.
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un projected Han as an excellent man and model of the people's security men in the era of Songun trained by the Workers' Party of Korea. He made sure that Han led an eternal life and his alma mater was named after him.
					
					 A renaming ceremony took place on Saturday.

articles.title: Reclamation of Sepho Tableland Progresses Apace
articles.content:
Reclamation of Sepho Tableland Progresses Apace
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Achievements are being registered in reclaiming Sepho tableland of the DPRK.
					 Projects for laying a firm foundation for stockbreeding have made brisk headway. More than 20,000 hectares of tableland were reclaimed, pasture was created, drainage extending more than 270 km was dug and roads and those for grazing extending about 1,000 km were built in recent two months. 
					
					 Soldiers of the Korean People's Army carried out their plan for creating a vast area of pasture at more than 80 percent and have put tending of pasture on a scientific and technological basis. They are stepping up the construction of dwelling houses at a final stage while pushing forward the construction of stables at a fast speed.
					
					 Soldiers of the Korean People's Internal Security Forces finished the construction of ring-shape road extending more than 3,700 km and have ensured materials needed for building dozens of blocks of stockbreeding base and dwelling houses, increasing the speed of the projects.
					
					 Members of the shock brigade of the Ministry of Railways established a strict drainage system to weather the rainy season and are successfully pushing ahead with manuring and tending. They are taking the lead in carrying out tasks to create pasture and dig drainages.
					
					 In July the shock brigade of the Pyongyang City Brigade removed 1,200 cubic meters of earth, laid 2 000 square meters of feldspar, improved rivers and streams extending more than a thousand meters to prevent damage from flooding. Each battalion built nurseries to create shelterbelts, created hundreds of hectares of pasture and built roads for grazing extending dozens of kilometers.
					
					 The Ichon County Division created pasture of 80 percent of the pasture under the plan while shock brigade members of the Sepho and Phyonggang county divisions registered achievements in their projects.
					
					 Achievements were reported from the worksites for securing domestic animals of good strains and establishing scientific breeding and poultry production systems.

articles.title: Monument to Field Guidance of Peerlessly Great Persons Erected in Sinchang-ri
articles.content:
Monument to Field Guidance of Peerlessly Great Persons Erected in Sinchang-ri
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Monument to field guidance of the peerlessly great persons "May Undying Feats Performed in Land of Sinchang Shine Forever" was erected in Sinchang-ri, Sinwon County, South Hwanghae Province.
					 Sinchang-ri is associated with the revolutionary history of President Kim Il Sung, General Secretary Kim Jong Il and anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk who worked heart and soul to develop the country's agriculture and bring happiness to the people.
					
					 The officials of the province and the county and agricultural workers of the Sinchang Cooperative Farm erected the monument with natural granite with their single desire to eternally glorify the leadership feats of the great persons.
					
					 An unveiling ceremony took place on the spot.

articles.title: Quality Building Materials, New Goods Mass-produced at Taedonggang Tile Factory
articles.content:
Quality Building Materials, New Goods Mass-produced at Taedonggang Tile Factory
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The Taedonggang Tile Factory of the DPRK is mass-producing varieties of good quality building materials and sending them to the construction sites of apartment houses for scientists and other places. It is registering achievements in studying and developing new products.
					 Production at the factory has reached all-time high in August since its foundation. As a result, tile production grew 20 percent as compared with that in the corresponding period of last year.
					
					 The officials, workers and technicians of the factory studied and introduced dozens of valuable inventions, rationalization proposals and technological innovation proposals this year alone, contributing to boosting tile production.
					
					 Technicians and workers studied and developed new tile products which look like wood, brick and stone.
					
					 There appeared at the factory a shop producing a variety of finishing building materials.
					
					 It succeeded in turning out trial products including tile adhesive, material for filling up the space between tiles and horizontal mortar and started their production.
					
					 Popular at construction sites are adhesive good for pasting ordinary tile and large quality building materials such as artificial marble tile and glass compound tile and directly pasting new tile on the old tile and multi-color materials for filling up the space between tiles as required by the aesthetic taste of architecture.
					
					 In addition, the factory is turning out varieties of new products including waterproof materials and enamel.

articles.title: Amateur Table-Tennis Tournament to Be Held in DPRK
articles.content:
Amateur Table-Tennis Tournament to Be Held in DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The 2013 Amateur Table-Tennis Tournament will take place at the indoor stadium of Kim Chaek University of Technology here from August 25 to September 1 to mark the 65th birthday of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The tournament is aimed at improving the health of disabled persons and helping them contribute to society and collective.
					
					 It will bring together disabled persons and amateurs selected in the preliminaries held in North and South Phyongan and Hamgyong and Kangwon provinces.
					
					 From each province three top players and three others who showed strong mental power, fortitude and noble traits in the preliminaries will compete in singles and doubles.
					
					 The tournament will be participated in by disabled persons of 12 years and upward and male amateurs over 38 and female amateurs over 35.
					
					 The top players will be awarded cups, medals and prizes.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' "Human Rights" Campaign against DPRK Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' "Human Rights" Campaign against DPRK Slammed
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The south Korean conservative regime is hosting a "public hearing" with human scum allegedly to "secure testimonies regarding the human rights situation in the north" after introducing into south Korea the investigation group of the UN Committee for Investigation into Human Rights in the North.
					 Prime Minister Jong Hong Won, when meeting the riff-raffs of the investigation group, bragged that the south is promoting the institution of the "law on human rights in the north", while talking about "universal value of humankind".
					
					 A commentary of Rodong Sinmun Saturday says that the south Korean ruling forces' act of kicking up the smear human rights campaign against the DPRK going against the trend of the situation toward dialogue is a serious politically-motivated provocation of chilling the atmosphere for dialogue and improvement of the relations between the north and the south.
					
					 Thanks to the sincere efforts and positive measures taken by the DPRK, there created the atmosphere for dialogue and cooperation on the Korean Peninsula where tensions had soared in recent months, the commentary says, adding:
					
					 It is essential to stop all confrontational acts against the dialogue partner to keep the hard-won atmosphere for dialogue.
					
					 The "public hearing" with the attendance of members of the plot-breeding organization being staged by the south Korean ruling forces is a product of an unpardonable criminal plot to hurt the ideology and social system of the fellow countrymen in league with outsiders.
					
					 The institution of the "law on human rights in the north" cried out by the south Korean "prime minister" is little short of an open declaration that he wants "unification of social systems", not confidence, unity and independent reunification of the north and the south.
					
					 The south Korean authorities are speaking loudly of building "confidence" between the north and the south. If they are sincere in this claim, they should stop the smear "human rights" campaign of distrusting and antagonizing the ideology and social system of their fellow countrymen in the north.

articles.title: Carrying Out Last Instructions of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il for Reunification Is National Duty: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Carrying Out Last Instructions of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il for Reunification Is National Duty: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The country's reunification was the lifelong desire of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 It is the sacred duty and honorable task to be fulfilled by our generation to certainly realize the country's reunification, the last instructions of the Generalissimos.
					
					 We have to achieve the historic cause of the country's reunification at any cost and successfully realize the noble desire of the Generalissimos.
					
					 It is the unanimous desire of all the Korean people to reunify the country and lead a happy life as the most proud nation in the world.
					
					 The country's reunification is possible if the north and the south fundamentally improve the inter-Korean relations and the compatriots from all walks of life at home and abroad pool their efforts for it.
					
					 They should turn out in the nation-wide struggle for independent reunification, peace and prosperity with confidence and optimism about the reunification.
					
					 They should briskly conduct the campaigns for reunification in the north and the south and abroad and intensify solidarity, alliance and joint actions for the country's reunification, irrespective of ideology, ism and social system. 
					
					 All the Koreans in the north and the south and abroad should display ardent patriotism and usher in a new phase of the country's reunification this year through the nation-wide patriotic struggle.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Preserving Juche Character, National Identity
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Preserving Juche Character, National Identity
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- To preserve the Juche character and national identity is a principled issue in carrying out the popular masses' cause of independence and socialism in conformity with its intrinsic requirement and historical and realistic conditions, says Rodong Sinmun in an article Saturday.
					 The independent development of the country and nation can not be expected and the victorious progress of the cause of global independence would be unthinkable without the struggle against imperialism and dominationism, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 Throughout the historical period of the revolutionary struggle, the Korean people have opposed imperialism and hegemony and firmly preserved the Juche character and national identity under the leadership of the great leaders and great party. Therefore, they could creditably ensure the independent development of the country and nation and win the brilliant victory in the revolution and construction.
					
					 To preserve the Juche character and national identity accompanies uncompromising struggle against the imperialists who seek to usurp it.
					
					 To promote the national pride and self-confidence presents itself as a very important issue in preserving the Juche character and national identity in the revolution and construction and successfully carrying out the cause of the people for independence and socialism.
					
					 If a country lacks national pride and self-confidence, it will not be able to preserve the Juche character and national identity, being deprived of the spirit of national independence but will be put under the control of other nation in the end.
					
					 The situation clearly proves that if a country fails to preserve the Juche character and national identity, it will lose independence in the revolution and construction, its people will become fool and the country and nation will end up in ruin.
					
					 The practical experience of the Korean revolution and the historical review of the DPRK prove that independence is the life and future of the country and nation and that the guarantee of the victory of the popular masses' cause of independence and the cause of global independence lies in upholding the banner of independence.

articles.title: Ukishima-maru Explosion Incident, Product of Plot to Kill Koreans: News Analyst
articles.content:
Ukishima-maru Explosion Incident, Product of Plot to Kill Koreans: News Analyst
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- 68 years have passed since thousands of Koreans were ruthlessly killed by the Ukishima-maru explosion incident committed by the Japanese imperialists.
					 It was a deliberate and premeditated massacre of Koreans committed with the approval of the Japanese government and in line with a scenario of its military authorities from A to Z.
					
					 On August 22, 1945 the Japanese imperialists let Korean draftees go aboard transport ship Ukishima-maru which anchored at Ominato Port in Aomori Prefecture with a false promise to send them back home.
					
					 The Japanese imperialists made the ship with at least 3,700 Koreans aboard sail toward the south near the coastal areas, not to Pusan Port of Korea from the outset.
					
					 On August 24 they detonated explosive installed in the ship near Maizuru Port, sinking it and sending the majority of Koreans to the bottom of the sea.
					
					 After the incident, the captain of the ship and Japanese reactionaries claimed that the ship was sunk by a mine. But this turned out to be a sheer lie.
					
					 A former crewman of the ship in his testimony said that the ship was left with a small quantity of fuel at the time of its departure and it had no plan to sail to Pusan Port.
					
					 Moreover, the route to Maizuru Port was safe as mines had been cleared. There were more than 500 ships, each with a displacement of 1,000 tons in the port at that time, sailing in and out. So no one could believe that the above-said ship ran into a mine.
					
					 So Pong A and Kwon Sang Gil, Koreans in Japan who narrowly survived the disaster made the following testimonies: When the ship was sinking, a man called Paek who was an MP of the Japanese navy came out to the deck and jumped into the sea after shouting "Japs detonated explosive to sink the ship." And three soldiers of the Japanese Navy yelled "Catch that guy and kill him" while chasing him.
					
					 This goes to clearly prove that the Ukishima-maru explosion incident was a product of the plot deliberately hatched by the Japanese imperialists to  massacre Koreans in a bid to recover from their defeat in the war and hide the crimes they committed by forcing the Korean draftees to work like a beast of burden.
					
					 The Japanese militarists are devils unprecedented in the world history and the sworn enemy of the Korean people.
					
					 This incident is a tip of iceberg of all crimes committed by Japan against the Korean people in the past.
					
					 The Japanese imperialists killed more than one million innocent Koreans and walked away at least 8.4 million young and middle-aged people, forcing them to do slave labor during their colonial fascist rule over Korea for more than 40 years.
					
					 The Japanese militarists took 200,000 Korean women to battle fields as sexual slaves for the aggression army, ruthlessly violating their chastity. They vandalized and plundered many cultural treasures of the Korean nation.
					
					 But Japan is still denying all its hideous crimes committed against the Korean people in the past, insisting that the Ukishima-maru incident was an "accidental sinking of the ship due to a mine". It is a shameless artifice peculiar to Japan to evade the heavy responsibility for the past crimes and follow in the footsteps of aggressors.
					
					 Japan should not evade the blame for the past crimes but make a thoroughgoing probe into the truth about them and open them to public, strictly punish those responsible for them and make an apology and reparation for the crimes.
					
					 This is the only way for Japan to shake off the ill-fame of a war criminal state and an inhuman state and advance toward a bright future.

articles.title: Names of Places Associated with Songun Revolutionary Feats of Kim Jong Il, Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Names of Places Associated with Songun Revolutionary Feats of Kim Jong Il, Kim Jong Un
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The Songun revolutionary feats of the great Generalissimo Kim Jong Il are deeply cherished in the hearts of the service personnel and people of the DPRK along with the names of unforgettable places.
					 The journey of Songun which General Secretary Kim Jong Il made till the last moments of his life began in Ssangun-ri.
					
					 Chol Pass known as a symbol of the Songun revolutionary leadership tells the touching story about the long journey of Songun made by him.
					
					 The path with 152 turns along the sharp-cut cliff on Mt. Osong reminds the people of the arduous and rugged path of Songun covered by him.
					
					 He pushed his car up the slippery path along the sharp-cut cliff being exposed to the sudden downpour. Mt. Osong, therefore, rises imposingly as the mountain of Songun associated with traces of death-defying struggle.
					
					 Mt. Taedok, the birthplace of the slogan of a-match-for-a-hundred, could also be found in the history of the high-intensity forced march made by the illustrious commander of Songun. 
					
					 Panmunjom conveys the strong gut and pluck of the brilliant commander of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Height 351, Height 1211 and Mt. Jihye from where enemy positions are just within earshot and other places were recorded in the Songun revolutionary history of the illustrious commander.
					
					 There are many other places associated with the road to the front covered by him. They include Cho Islet where he went defying rough storms to meet soldiers there, high and steep ridges on which he guided mobile and tactical exercises and firepower training of units, a peak where he had a rice ball as lunch and a site of repairing tunnel where he brightened the site with the headlight of his car until soldier-builders finished their meals. 
					
					 Those meaningful names of places recorded in his Songun revolutionary leadership history are shining as there is another brilliant commander of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un is just identical to Kim Jong Il in his Songun leadership. Kim Jong Un is ushering in the great heyday of building the revolutionary armed forces through his ceaseless visits to posts on the foremost front areas including a post on Kkachil Peak of Mt. Osong, Jangjae Islet, Mu Islet and Wolnae Islet situated in the biggest hotspot area.

articles.title: World's Cultural Heritages in Kaesong City of DPRK (2)
articles.content:
World's Cultural Heritages in Kaesong City of DPRK (2)
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The Kaesong Walls and the Kaesong Nam Gate in Kaesong City, the DPRK, were listed as the world's cultural heritages in late June.
					 The Kaesong Walls extending 23 kilometers surround Kaesong City, the capital of Koryo (918-1392), Korea's first unified state.
					
					 The walls consist of royal fort, divided into Hwang and Kung forts, and inner and outer forts.
					
					 Hwang Fort was built with Kung Fort along the foot of Mt. Songak in 896, early period of building Koryo.
					
					 The Outer Fort, 16 km long, was built against the invasion of outsiders in 1029 with mobilization of more than 230,000 laborers and 8,450 technicians, according to "Koryo History", an ancient document.
					
					 The Inner Fort, 8.5 km long, was built in 1391-1393.
					
					 The Kaesong Nam Gate is the south gate to the Inner Fort in the Kaesong Walls. It was built late in the period of Koryo Kingdom.
					
					 The gate consists of the gateway structure built with well-trimmed rectangular plane granite stones and a pavilion above it.
					
					 The hip-saddle roof pavilion with double eaves is 13.63 meters long on the front and 7.96 meters wide on the flank.
					
					 Yonbok Temple Bell, one of the three famous bells in the DPRK, is in the pavilion.

articles.title: S. Koreans Protest against U.S.-S. Korea Joint War Exercises
articles.content:
S. Koreans Protest against U.S.-S. Korea Joint War Exercises
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification in south Korea staged a demo in the drill ground in Jikchon-ri, Phaju City of Kyonggi Province on Aug. 21 in protest against the on-going U.S.-south Korean military exercises against the DPRK. 
					 When they staged the demo in front of a U.S. tank involved in the drill, the police ran wild to put down the demo.

articles.title: Massacre of Koreans by Japanese Imperialists during Great Kanto Quake Exposed
articles.content:
Massacre of Koreans by Japanese Imperialists during Great Kanto Quake Exposed
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Kang Hyo Suk, professor at Wongwang  University of south Korea, recently open to public a document laying bare monstrous massacre of Koreans by the Japanese imperialists during the great Kanto quake in September 1923.
					 The document worked out by the German Foreign Ministry in March 1924 contains information that Koreans were ruthlessly killed by Japanese and evidence proving the atrocities.
					
					 It said that the Japanese government issued a special order to the army and police in those days to "kill all Koreans, men and women, young and old, in streets."
					
					 When confusion was getting serious due to the great quake, the Japanese government spread a rumor that Koreans were to rise up in an uprising in a bid to divert the people's grievances elsewhere and indiscriminately killed Koreans by mobilizing the army, police and "ultra-right organizations", the document noted.
					
					 The professor said that mass-killings of Koreans in those days were sparked off as "Japanese diverted the resentment and despair they felt at the quake to the Koreans."
					
					 The professor expressed the determination to make deeper study of the data disclosing the mass killings of Koreans committed by the Japanese imperialists during the great Kanto quake.

articles.title: DPRK Is Not Such Country as Described by West: Foreign Visitors
articles.content:
DPRK Is Not Such Country as Described by West: Foreign Visitors
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Foreign visitors highly praised the real picture of Songun Korea dynamically advancing towards bright future. 
					 Mikhail Serzyuk, deputy to the State Duma of Russia, said that the impressions he got of the DPRK were quite different from what the Western media reported about it.
					
					 Explaining the reason why he said so, he noted: Western media are busy with false propaganda about the DPRK. 
					
					 I got impressions that the Korean people feel happy. In fact, we saw their bright smiles and happiness. I do not want to beautify what I witnessed. 
					
					 Antonio Lazi, a senator of Italy, said that the DPRK is not such country as claimed by the West. 
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The Korean people are simple and have a high sense of etiquette. 
					
					 The DPRK is a very stable country. Streets are beautiful and clean and new skyscraper apartment houses stand in rows. 
					
					 I advise all people to visit the DPRK. It is better to go the DPRK before saying anything about it. 
					
					 Borges Rodriguez, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Brazilian Communist Party, said he was greatly shocked to watch the July 27 celebrations in the DPRK.
					
					 Policies for people are enforced in the DPRK in practice.
					
					 The heroic Korean people are dynamically and confidently advancing. 
					
					 The military parade, cheerful masses and the disciplined Korean People's Army equipped with modern war hardware left an unforgettable impression to me.
					
					 Kazbek Taysaev, secretary of the C.C., the Communist Party of the Russian Federation and first secretary of the Committee of the North Osetiya Republic, said that the DPRK has fast developing economy, adding:
					
					 I commanded a bird's-eye view of beautiful Pyongyang from the observation deck of the Tower of the Juche Idea and had a clear understanding of the DPRK. It is hard to conceal and distort the gains and achievements made by the heroic Korean people of which bourgeois media have spoken ill. During an event I had a chance of seeing Kim Jong Un, leader of the DPRK, very near from me and found him very kind-hearted and benign.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Visit to Russia Marked in Khabarovsk
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Visit to Russia Marked in Khabarovsk
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Round-table talks and film show were held in Khabarovsk on Aug. 19 to mark the 2nd anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's visit to Siberian and Far Eastern regions of the Russian Federation and the 11th anniversary of his visit to Far Eastern region.
					 Present there were members of the leadership of the Khabarovsk Territorial Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation. Officials of the DPRK consulate general in Nakhodka were present on invitation.
					
					 Gromov, first secretary of the Khabarovsk Territorial Committee of the party, referred to the fact that Kim Jong Il visited Russia several times, making a great contribution to the development of the friendly relations between the two countries.
					
					 He continued:
					
					 It is the result of Kim Jong Il's wise leadership that the cooperation with the DPRK is brisk in the Far Eastern region of Russia.
					
					 The Far Eastern region is a friendly neighbor bordering on the DPRK.
					
					 It is important for Russia to develop the multi-faceted cooperation with the DPRK.
					
					 We support the DPRK's efforts for peace and stability in the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia.
					
					 We will make positive efforts to boost the relations between our party and the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The participants of the film show watched a Korean film documenting Kim Jong Il's historic visit to Russia.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Songun Revolutionary Leadership Praised by British Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Songun Revolutionary Leadership Praised by British Organizations
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on Aug. 17 to mark the 53rd anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 The statement said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il's field guidance to Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the Korean People's Army on Aug. 25, 1960 marked a significant event which heralded his succession to the Songun revolutionary cause.
					
					 He performed immortal exploits on behalf of the times and revolution, the country and humankind with his outstanding idea and extraordinary leadership for half a century.
					
					 In those days when he started his Songun revolutionary leadership the U.S. imperialists escalated international tensions to an extreme pitch and the modern revisionists, scared by this, pressurized the DPRK to give up its anti-imperialist stand while talking about "peaceful co-existence and cooperation".
					
					 But he declared that he would further bolster up the revolutionary armed forces, true to the noble intention of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 He trained the People's Army as an invincible revolutionary army for more than half a century since he embarked upon the road of Songun revolution.
					
					 The Juche-oriented Songun revolutionary cause is now making dynamic progress without an inch of deflection under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Russian Paper Accuses U.S. of Refusing to Conclude Peace Treaty with DPRK
articles.content:
Russian Paper Accuses U.S. of Refusing to Conclude Peace Treaty with DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The Russian newspaper Pravda on Aug. 15 carried an article "U.S. has no intention to conclude a peace treaty with DPRK". 
					 Accusing the U.S. and its followers of conducting groundless false propaganda against the DPRK, the paper went on:
					
					 The purpose of the U.S. accusation against the DPRK is to paint the DPRK as an "axis of evil" again. To this end, everything is carefully orchestrated and all levers are used. 
					
					 Terming the DPRK an "axis of evil" the U.S. regards it as a pretext for keeping its aggression forces and missile shield forward-deployed in the areas near the borders of Russia and China. 
					
					 The U.S. has no intention to conclude a peace treaty with the DPRK. 
					
					 It does not consider it necessary to conclude a peace treaty with Pyongyang. When a peace treaty is concluded, the U.S. Administration and munitions monopolies will lose a justification to keep its troops and build a missile shield in the Far East region. 
					
					 Its scenario is clear and simple. It is to isolate the DPRK as a "rogue state" and create an environment for justifying its behavior in the United Nations and international community. 
					
					 The U.S. is openly escalating the moves to stifle the DPRK in violation of international law. 
					
					 Its strategic goal is to put the whole of the Korean Peninsula under its control and come closer to the borders of Russia and China and expand the sphere of influence in the Asia-Pacific region.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige entrenamiento movil de buque nuevamente construido
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige entrenamiento movil de buque nuevamente construido
Pyongyang, 24 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio el entrenamiento movil del buque de guerra nuevamente construido.
					Recorriendolo, el Mariscal se cercioro en detalles de su desplazamiento, velocidad y funcionamientos de los armamentos y equipos combativo-tecnicos del buque.
					
					Evaluo altamente que el EPC y el sector correspondiente hayan construido excelentemente por sus propias fuerzas y tecnicas el buque a que se aplicaron los resultados de ciencias y tecnicas militares de punta.
					
					Enfatizo que ese es nave de combate del siglo 21 capaz de realizar automaticamente todas las acciones combativas incluyendo la navegacion y el disparo y de ejecutar a la vez golpes a todos los blancos.
					
					A continuacion, dirigio el entrenamiento movil del buque y se mostro muy satisfecho viendo la elevada movilidad y fuerza de golpe del buque.
					
					Hay que producir buques de combate multifuncionales y elevar constantemente la capacidad de las fuerzas navales para la operacion maritima, recalco y dio las tareas programaticas que se presentan en fortalecer las fuerzas navales conforme a la demanda de la guerra contemporanea del siglo 21.
					
					Le acompanaron Yun Tong Hyon, Pak Jong Chon, Kim Myong Sik, Ri Pyong Chol, Hwang Pyong So, Hong Yong Chil y Kim Pyong Ho.

articles.title: Acto central por Dia de Songun
articles.content:
Acto central por Dia de Songun
Pyongyang, 24 de agosto (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar este sabado en la Casa Cultural 25 de Abril el acto central por el 53o aniversario del inicio de la direccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun.
					Asistieron al acto Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, el presidente de partido amigo, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el poder, entidades sociales, ministerios y organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, los funcionarios de las instituciones de ciencia, educacion, literatura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion, los benemeritos laborales y trabajadores capitalinos. 
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo del vicemariscal del EPC, Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC y jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC.
					
					El orador se refirio a que la direccion sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun y la politica homonima del Dirigente reflejan la ferrea conviccion, la audacia incomparable y el inagotable espiritu patriotico del general insigne del Songun y patriota sin igual, y sirven de remedio omnipotente para allanar victoriosamente la nueva era de la revolucion del Juche. 
					
					La orientacion del Dirigente sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun trajo un cambio trascendental en el destino de la patria y el pueblo y su fuerza atractiva y vitalidad se han manifestado sin reservas en la lucha revolucionaria y la construccion en conjunto, dijo y continuo:
					
					Hoy dia, la causa revolucionaria del Songun acoge una nueva era de viraje historico gracias al Mariscal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					Debemos apoyar con fidelidad la guia del Mariscal sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun.
					
					Hay que formar a todos los oficiales y soldados del EPC como los fuertes en la ideologia y conviccion, fieles al partido y al lider y combatientes que encarnan la estrategia y tacticas de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il y la capacidad de hacer la guerra real y perfeccionar el aspecto regular del ejercito revolucionario. 
					
					Todos los oficiales y soldados del EPC y los habitantes deben avivar las llamas de la creacion de "velocidad Masikryong" y registrar constantes saltos e innovaciones en todos los frentes de la construccion socialista. 
					
					Es mas preciosa que nada la paz para nosotros que tomamos por la meta final la construccion de la potencia economica y la mejora de las condiciones de vida del pueblo. 
					
					El pueblo coreano no desea la guerra sino aspira a reunificar la patria de manera independiente y pacifica evitando los conflictos fratricidas. 
					
					Haremos todos los esfuerzos por prevenir la nueva guerra en la Peninsula Coreana y lograr la reunificacion independiente y pacifica con las fuerzas unidas de la nacion manteniendo la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, programas de reunificacion comun de la nacion de nuevo siglo y jalon de paz y prosperidad. 
					
					Bajo el ideal de la independencia, la paz y la amistad, ampliaremos las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion con varios paises que respetan la soberania de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la tratan con amabilidad y contribuiremos a defender la paz y la estabilidad del Nordeste Asiatico y el resto del mundo y verificar la independencia en el mundo entero.

articles.title: Tienen lugar conversaciones intercoreanas de cruz roja
articles.content:
Tienen lugar conversaciones intercoreanas de cruz roja 
Pyongyang, 24 de agosto (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar la vispera en Phanmunjom las conversaciones de trabajo de la cruz roja entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea.
					En la ocasion, ambas partes discutieron el problema de realizar el encuentro de familiares y parientes, que viven separados en el Norte y el Sur, con motivo de Chusok (15 de agosto lunar, fiesta folclorica).
					
					Segun el acuerdo aprobado, ambas partes coreanas acordaron organizar del 25 al 30 de septiembre en el monte Kumgang el encuentro de familiares y parientes separados.
					
					Acudiran al encuentro 100 personas por cada parte. 
					
					El Norte y el Sur de Corea intercambiaran el dia 29 de agosto las notas de solicitud de confirmacion del paradero de 200-250 personas a su conveniencia, los mensajes de respuesta el 13 de septiembre y las listas finales de los participantes en el encuentro el dia 16 del mismo mes.
					
					La forma y modo de encuentro se realizaran como de costumbre.
					
					Ambas partes enviaran al terreno el grupo de avanzada 5 dias antes del inicio de encuentro.
					
					Se pusieron de acuerdo en organizar desde el dia 22 hasta 23 de octubre las reuniones de video de 40 familias por cada parte.
					
					Consintieron sostener una vez mas el encuentro dentro de noviembre y quedaron en debatir este tema en las conversaciones de trabajo de la cruz roja que sostendran inmediatamente despues del encuentro preparado en ocasion de Chusok.
					
					Acordaron seguir esforzandose por solucionar radicalmente el problema de familiares y parientes separados, incluyendo organizar regularmente el encuentro de ellos, la confirmacion de paradero y el intercambio de cartas.
					
					Firmaron el acuerdo el jefe de la delegacion de la parte Norte, Pak Yong Il, y su par surcoreano Ri Tok Haeng.

articles.title: Publicada declaracion de Asociacion de Esqui de Corea
articles.content:
Publicada declaracion de Asociacion de Esqui de Corea
Pyongyang, 24 de agosto (ACNC) -- El portavoz de la Asociacion de Esqui de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia 24 la siguiente declaracion:
					Ahora se impulsa en etapa final la construccion del campo de esqui del monte Masik de talla mundial, iniciada el ano pasado segun la decision y proyecto del Partido del Trabajo de Corea de ofrecer a los habitantes, jovenes y ninos escolares las condiciones de vida mas culta y feliz. 
					
					Quedaron completadas las pistas de esqui y estan a punto de inauguracion todos los establecimientos, incluso hoteles y edificios de servicios y alojamientos.
					
					Se ha preparado ademas la garantia para terminar dentro de este ano la construccion del campo de esqui. 
					
					Pero, sucedio hace poco un incidente muy anormal en que algunos paises impidieron la exportacion a la RPDC de los equipos de teleferico del campo de esqui como parte de la "sancion" de la ONU. 
					
					La RPDC no reconoce desde el principio la "resolucion de sancion" de la ONU en su contra y este mismo documento no incluye en los reglones de sancion los objetos necesarios a la construccion economica y a la vida del pueblo.
					
					No se puede hacer un cohete ni arma nuclear con los equipos de teleferico del campo de esqui. 
					
					Si los gobiernos de algunos paises han pensado que los habitantes comunes de la RPDC no pueden usar el campo de esqui, esto seria insoportable insulto al regimen y pueblo coreanos.
					
					EE.UU. y sus satelites tratan de impedir que se levanten en la RPDC las creaciones monumentales y crezca el prestigio de ella, considerando estos exitos como espina atravesada en su garganta. 
					
					Rendidos a la coaccion de EE.UU., algunos paises impiden el suministro a la RPDC hasta de los equipos a instalar en las facilidades de deporte masivo como campo de esqui, lo cual significa violacion flagrante de la Carta de la ONU que establece que la sancion no debe causar danos a la existencia y actividades pacificas de la humanidad ni a los pueblos de los paises correspondientes.
					
					No se puede justificar por nada esa conducta sucia.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe felicitaciones de Choummaly Sayasone
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe felicitaciones de Choummaly Sayasone
Pyongyang, 24 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le remitiera el dia 23, Choummaly Sayasone, secretario general del Comite Central del Partido Popular Revolucionario Lao y presidente de la Republica Democratica Popular Lao.
					La misiva va como sigue:
					
					Con motivo del 65o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, extiendo la calurosa felicitacion y el cordial saludo a Vd. y por su conducto al Partido del Trabajo de Corea, al gobierno y a todo el hermano pueblo coreano en nombre del CC del PPRL, el gobierno y en el mio propio.
					
					Estoy regocijado de que la RPDC, que cuenta con Vd. como maximo dirigente, logra notables exitos en la sagrada labor por defender y construir firmemente y para siempre la patria y mejorar mas la vida del pueblo y que las magnificas y tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre la RDPL y RPDC se consolidan y se desarrollan dia a dia conforme a los intereses de ambos pueblos y a la paz, la estabilidad y la colaboracion regionales y mundiales.
					
					En esta oportunidad jubilosa, deseo que Vd. tenga buena salud y al conducir la RPDC siga obteniendo nuevas victorias mas grandes en su sublime causa para defender y construir la patria y reunificar la Corea de manera pacifica.
					
					Reciba el testimonio de mi mas alta consideracion.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju visita complejo quimico de Namhung y central termoelectrica de Chongchongang
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju visita complejo quimico de Namhung y central termoelectrica de Chongchongang
Pyongyang, 24 de agosto (ACNC) -- El primer ministro Pak Pong Ju averiguo en el terreno el estado de produccion del Complejo Quimico Juventud de Namhung y la Central Termoelectrica de Chongchongang.
					Recorriendo varios lugares de la primera empresa, estimulo a los funcionarios y obreros que registran innovaciones en la produccion de abono. 
					
					En la reunion de consulta convocada, se dio enfasis en producir mucho mas abono Juche y otros productos quimicos y se exigio a las unidades relacionadas suministrar suficientes materias primas y materiales necesarios a la produccion. 
					
					En la consulta abierta en la Central Termoelectrica de Chongchongang, fue debatido el tema de mejorar la administracion de equipos y la operacion tecnica para el aumento de la produccion de electricidad.
					
					Por otra parte, el premier paso revista a la exposicion nacional de 206 articulos miscelaneos de uso diario y a un campo experimental de la Academia de Ciencia Agricola donde instruyo aumentar las variedades y cantidad de articulos de consumo y elevar el nivel industrial de la agricultura.

articles.title: Delegacion gubernamental de RPDC visita Camerun
articles.content:
Delegacion gubernamental de RPDC visita Camerun
Pyongyang, 24 de agosto (ACNC) -- La delegacion gubernamental de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea encabezada por el canciller Pak Ui Chun realizo una visita a la Republica de Camerun.
					El premier de esta Republica, Yang Yunji Philemon, departio el dia 22 en la sede del gobierno con la delegacion en un ambiente amistoso.
					
					En la audiencia, el premier dijo que Camerun aprecia mucho las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion de larga historia entre ambos paises.
					
					Deseo que bajo Su Excelencia Kim Jong Un, el pueblo coreano logre mayores exitos en la construccion de un Estado prospero.
					
					Expuso la voluntad de hacer aporte a ampliar y desarrollar las relaciones de cooperacion entre ambos paises en el principio de respeto y beneficio mutuos. 
					
					Con anterioridad, tuvieron lugar las conversaciones entre el canciller Pak y su homologo camerunes, Pierre Moukoko Mbonjo.
					
					En la ocasion, estuvieron presentes por la parte coreana los miembros de la delegacion el embajador de la RPDC en Camerun, y por la otra, el ministro delegado al ministro de RR.EE., el secretario general de la misma cartera y otras personalidades.
					
					Ambas partes intercambiaron sus opiniones sobre el problema de desarrollar las relaciones bilaterales de amistad y otros asuntos de interes mutuo.

articles.title: Abierto encuentro de explicacion sobre turismo de Corea
articles.content:
Abierto encuentro de explicacion sobre turismo de Corea
Pyongyang, 24 de agosto (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 24 en el Hotel Internacional Yanggakdo el encuentro de explicacion sobre el turismo de Corea auspiciado por la Agencia de Viaje Internacional de Corea.
					A la cita fueron invitados los miembros de las embajadas de varios paises acreditados en Corea y los delegados de las agencias de turismo de China, Gran Bretana, Alemania y otros paises.
					
					Intervino el presidente de la Agencia de Viaje Internacional de Corea Jo Song Gyu.
					
					Primero, Jo recordo el proceso de desarrollo del turismo de Corea y la politica sobre esta labor.
					
					Las zonas de los montes Paektu, Kumgang y Chilbo y la ciudad de Wonsan y otros lugares pintorescos y diversas regiones se convirtieron en los destinos de descanso del pueblo y de turismo y se impulsa activamente el desarrollo de ellas, subrayo y continuo:
					
					En estas zonas especiales de turismo, todas las actividades administrativas entre otras el paso de la frontera y aduana, impuesto, comunicaciones y proteccion de inversion se realizaran acorde a la ley de la zona especial de Corea y la norma internacional.
					
					Daremos bienvenida a los empresarios y los inversionistas de los paises o regiones, que vengan a nuestro pais interesadas en esas actividades, y seran autorizadas con preferencia las empresas independientes, comanditarias y mixtas.
					
					Tenemos previsto cursar la invitacion a los especialistas extranjeros que necesitan en el desarrollo y la operacion de la ciudad de Wonsan y la zona del monte Chilbo.
